last_episode_to_air.name: Hip Hop Ballroom, Fun Fishing Lake, New York Central Park Egg Hunt
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shorties sync to songs by Jennifer Lopez and Pitbull, Maddie and Tae, and Bruno Mars in performances that take viewers to a ballroom competition, a fishing lake with big surprises, and a colorful egg hunt in New York City.

name: Lip Sync Battle Shorties
overview: Children lip sync pop songs in celebration of their favorite artists.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Modern Family's Sarah Hyland hosts the lip syncing competition where real kids compete, complete with celebrity special guests, mind-blowing performances and so much more.

episodes.name: Halloween Special
episodes.overview: Three children use their imagination to personalize their Halloween-themed lip sync performances.

episodes.name: Cali Beach/Las Vegas/Alice in Wonderland
episodes.overview: Katy Perry, Zedd and Alessia Cara, and Elvis Presley provide the songs for the shorties as they take viewers to the Las Vegas Strip, an Alice in Wonderland fantasy, and a California beach.

episodes.name: Havana Block Party, Mardi Gras Celebration, Basketball Court Get Down
episodes.overview: The Shorties sync it up to the biggest hits from Camila Cabello, OMI and Katy Perry; the performances are reminiscent of a Havana block party, a Mardi Gras celebration and a basketball-themed dance.

episodes.name: African Kingdom, Magical Library, NYE 2999
episodes.overview: Nick Cannon and JoJo Siwa introduce hits from Kanye West, P!nk and Justin Bieber in lip-sync performances taking place in an African superhero kingdom, a magical library where history comes to life, and Times Square on New Year's Eve 2999.

episodes.name: British Royal Palace, Western Movie Town, The White House
episodes.overview: Three new Shorties sync it up to hits from Iggy Azalea featuring Charli XCX, Maroon 5 and Beyonc√© in performances set in a British Royal palace, a Western movie town and the White House lawn.

episodes.name: Candy Store, Colorful Arcade, 4th of July Party
episodes.overview: Three JoJo Siwa superfans get the chance to sync to some of her biggest hits; Nick Cannon and JoJo Siwa host with a special appearance by BowBow.

episodes.name: Zombie Forrest, Cali Music Festival, Deep Space Planet
episodes.overview: The Shorties sync to hits from Fall Out Boy, Meghan Trainor and Coldplay in performances set in a spooky zombie forest, a California music festival and a planet in outer space with the coolest aliens.

episodes.name: Stadium Rock Concert, Gotham Style City, 80's Prom
episodes.overview: Three Shorties sync it up to Shawn Mendes, Kendrick Lamar and Zedd, Grey and Maren Morris; a garage band is transformed into stadium rockers, a superhero saves the day in Gotham, and there is an ultimate '80s prom.

episodes.name: Egyptian Tomb, Beauty Parlor, Drive in Movie
episodes.overview: The Black Eyed Peas, Lil Mama and Meghan Trainor provide the songs for the Shorties in lip-sync adventures in an Egyptian tomb, a poppin' beauty parlor, and the best-ever drive-in movie theater.

episodes.name: Hawaiian Luau, Dias de los Muertos Celebration, Superhero Training Camp
episodes.overview: Bruno Mars, Portugal. The Man and Katy Perry provide the tracks as the Shorties take viewers on lip-sync adventures to a Hawaiian luau, a Dia de los Muertos Mexican celebration, and a superhero training camp.

episodes.name: Broadway Style Weather Spectacular, Super Fun Circus, Cool Skiing Lodge
episodes.overview: Imagine Dragons, P!nk and Vanilla Ice get the lip-sync treatment from the Shorties as they take viewers to a Broadway weather spectacular, the greatest circus on Earth, and an iced-out ski lodge.

episodes.name: Hip Hop Ballroom, Fun Fishing Lake, New York Central Park Egg Hunt
episodes.overview: Shorties sync to songs by Jennifer Lopez and Pitbull, Maddie and Tae, and Bruno Mars in performances that take viewers to a ballroom competition, a fishing lake with big surprises, and a colorful egg hunt in New York City.
